entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
